summary: cat intestines were infected with 100 T. gondii cysts and their intestines were collected at 6, 12, 18, 24, 72 and 96 hours post-infection (hpi) transcriptome analysis revealed 2363 DEGs that were clustered into six unique patterns of gene expression across all the time points after infection. electronic supplementary material The online version of this article contains supplementary material. additional files Additional file 1: (12.8KB, xlsx) Table S1 Temporal changes in the number of the differentially expressed genes by cat chromosomes.
